sentences: Pärast tööd kukus ta kohe koju.
Ta tegi oma tööpäeva ära ja kui kell kukkus, seadis ta sammud kiiresti kodu poole.
context: The word 'kukkus' is the past tense form of the Estonian verb 'kukkuma', which means to fall or drop. It describes something that fell, dropped, or came down from a higher position to a lower one. The dictionary definition shows it's often used in relation to time - when time runs out or when an appointed time arrives.
